tasks.task: Create a child selector to target all the paragraphs in the article.
Create a descendent selector for all of the list items in the section with an ID of "main".
Create a class selector for all elements with a class of "pullquote".
Create a child selector for a list item with an ID of "nav_234".
Create a descendent selector for the li with a class of "active" in the nav element.
Create a child selector for the heading 1 elements in the sections with a class of "sidebar".
Create a selector for paragraph elements that are children of an article element which itself is a child of a section element.
Create a selector for heading 1 and heading 2 elements that are children of an article element which itself is a child of a section element with an ID of "main".
tasks.help: X > Y > Z1, X > Y > Z2
tasks.selector: section#main > article > h1, section#main > article > h2

tasks.task: Create a child selector for the fifth paragraph element of the article element.
Create a child selector for before the paragraph of the section with an ID of "copyright".
